headline: Best Antivirus (September 2025): Avast Named Top Cybersecurity Software by Software Experts
summary: Software Experts has recognized Avast as a top cybersecurity provider in its latest report on the best antivirus solutions for consumers and businesses. The recognition highlights Avast Premium Security and Avast Ultimate, two flagship products that have demonstrated strong performance in protecting users across Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android devices.
